title: Power Grid to infuse funds in National High Power Testing Laboratory; to hold 50 pc stake
description: Power Grid to invest in NHPTL, a joint venture with NTPC, NHPC, DVC, CPRI. Ministry of Power approved revival plan with equity transactions and revised board composition for short circuit testing facility.
